about_the_game:
A cold, dark cave stands between you and your journey to find yourself. In this treacherous world, your clones will have to be sacrificed to get out. Difficult decisions will be made.

Duped explores themes of loneliness, isolation, and identity, through a 2D action/puzzle platformer. Control a square on its journey to escape the cave it has found itself in. Create clones, control them, and crawl over their bodies to overcome obstacles.

Features:

  • Over 40 levels
  • Physics-based puzzles
  • Minimalist story

After all, they were just disposable parts, weren’t they?
detailed_description:
A cold, dark cave stands between you and your journey to find yourself. In this treacherous world, your clones will have to be sacrificed to get out. Difficult decisions will be made.

Duped explores themes of loneliness, isolation, and identity, through a 2D action/puzzle platformer. Control a square on its journey to escape the cave it has found itself in. Create clones, control them, and crawl over their bodies to overcome obstacles.

Features:

  • Over 40 levels
  • Physics-based puzzles
  • Minimalist story

After all, they were just disposable parts, weren’t they?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Duped

short_description: A 2D puzzle platformer where you play as a lonely cube trapped in a cold, dark cave. With your unique ability to clone yourself, escape by any means necessary. Sacrifices will have to be made.
